text: Zdeněk Hoření (9 February 1930 – 12 February 2021) was a Czechoslovak journalist and politician. He was Editor-in-Chief of Rudé právo. He was a member of the Communist Party. He was born in Frýdštejn, First Czechoslovak Republic. From 1986 to 1990, he was a member of the Federal Assembly. Before, he was a member of the Czech National Council from 1976 to 1986. Hoření died of COVID-19 during the COVID-19 pandemic in the Czech Republic in Prague on 12 February 2021 at the age of 91, three days after his birthday. ==References== Category:1930 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Deaths from the COVID-19 pandemic in Prague Category:Czechoslovak politicians Category:Czechoslovak journalists
title: Zdeněk Hoření
